content: > use these codes to save when you buy > multiple patterns > - saveon3 to save 10% off 3 patterns > - saveon5 to save 15% off 5 patterns > - saveon8 to save 20% off 8 patterns > > add all patterns to cart for discount > limit one use per purchase get back to basics with a classic twist earwarmer made with tunisian crochet double-thick and extra cozy this easy project is a great starter for beginner tunisian crocheters **sizes ** one size with instructions on how to customize fit finished measurements 4 wide by 19 circumference yarn used in sample 185 yds of knit picks kindred in goldenrod suggested needles and notions size k/6 5mm tunisian crochet hook tapestry needle scissors skills tunisian knit stitch mattress stitch running stitch ……………………………………………………………………………… the pdf is beautifully formatted for easy printing and downloading it includes a complete materials list abbreviations and stitch definitions pattern notes with additional resources written instructions pattern uses us crochet terminology and is available only in english ……………………………………………………………………………… making finished items you can sell finished products made from this pattern by giving credit to me as the designer and linking to the original blog post pattern please be respectful and do not sell or distribute this pattern in any way especially as your own instead share the original blog post link return policy there are no returns on digital files please contact me with any further questions thanks for browsing find me at website - www 1dogwoof com instagram - www instagram com/1dogwoof facebook - www facebook com/onedogwoof youtube - www youtube com/1dogwoof pinterest - www pinterest com/1dogwoof twitter - www twitter com/1dogwoof
